title: Login page not loading
description: User reports that the login page takes too long to load on mobile devices.

title: Payment gateway error
description: Payment gateway shows error code 504 when users attempt checkout.

title: Profile image not uploading
description: Customers are unable to upload profile images due to file size limit error.

title: Email notification delay
description: Emails for password reset are delayed by up to 30 minutes.

title: App crashes on Android 14
description: Several users reported crashes when opening the dashboard on Android 14 devices.

title: Incorrect billing amount
description: Customer received an invoice with incorrect total amount for September.

title: Search function not working
description: The search bar returns no results even when valid keywords are entered.

title: Dark mode color issue
description: Text is not visible properly in dark mode on the dashboard page.

title: Report generation slow
description: Generating monthly reports takes more than 5 minutes to complete.

title: UI overlap on small screens
description: Navigation menu overlaps with content on devices smaller than 400px.

title: Password reset link expired
description: Reset links sent to users expire within 5 minutes instead of 24 hours.

title: Unable to download invoice
description: Download button does not respond when clicking on invoices.
